contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the word "we" refers to the men that the king is speaking to and does not include the king. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-exclusive]])
The word "us" includes Daniel and the Israelites, but it does not include God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-exclusive]])
Daniel and Israel sinned and did wicked things, but "we" does not include God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-exclusive]])
contextId.glQuote: we sinned; we have done wicked things

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here "our" refers to Daniel and Israel, but not to God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-exclusive]])
